quotes.message: Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Caution is the eldest child of wisdom.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Caution is not cowardly. Carelessness is not courage.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: I don't like these cold, precise, perfect people, who, in order not to speak wrong, never speak at all, and in order not to do wrong, never do anything.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
quotes.name: Alfred Adler

quotes.message: Of all the thirty-six alternatives, running away is best.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: I have lived in this world just long enough to look carefully the second time into things that I am the most concerned of the first time.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: If you wish to succeed in life, make perseverance your bosom friend, experience your wise counselor, caution your elder brother, and hope your guardian genius.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Distrust and caution are the parents of security.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Caution is the confidential agent of selfishness
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson
